how-to-implement: in your meta.json - define *extended* with url to this (json) file - https://raw.githubusercontent.com/cardanians/adapools.org/master/example-meta.json

about.me: I am a computer programmer and server admin, I believe in decentralized finance and power to the people.
about.server: Instead of hosting servers at cloud platforms (which limits the idea of decentralizing), my servers are hosted in-house with power and internet backup. These high-end servers are actively cooling and the UPS system shares power with 3 solar arrays to save energy.

info.rss: http(s) url to valid RSS feed
